Class UserList

java.lang.Object
objects.UserList
public class UserList extends Object
This class represents a list of users

    • updateNickname

      public int updateNickname(InetAddress someonesAddress, String newNickname)
      Update the nickname of a user
      Parameters:
      someonesAddress - the ip address of the user to update
      newNickname - the new nickname of the user
      Returns:
      1 if the user is not in the list, 2 if the nickname is already taken, 0 if the nickname is successfully changed

    • getUserByIp

      public User getUserByIp(InetAddress ipAddress)
      Get a user by his ip address
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - the ip address of the user to get
      Returns:
      the user with the given ip address, null if the user is not in the list

    • getUserByNickname

      public User getUserByNickname(String nickname)
      Get a user by his nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the user to get
      Returns:
      the user with the given nickname, null if the user is not in the list
